## NodeImageBitmapConsumer.(constructor)

Create a new bitmap consumer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(input?: NodeImageBitmap | NIRawImage);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | <code>NodeImageBitmap &#124; NIRawImage</code> | Input value for initializing the consumer's bitmap. |
